name: The mighty carlic bread
description:
Greetings everyone :)

So this was my entry for the Ludum Dare 32. Unfortunately, I couldn't finish the game as I had in mind to, but still :) I'm quite happy with the outcome of my second Unity experience without any real experience in game development beforehand xD

The Story

The game is based on an adventurer and his allmighty weapon: the garlic bread of doom. With it's help, the brave player is able to slay those evil vampires he encounters in the mansion.

Well, the game is still in it's prototype form, so don't expect too much from it :P

Controls

Walking : Arrows
Slay the evil ones : Spacebar

Tools used

Unity 4, gimp, piskel

Thank you
